page.title: 02Farming
page.content: Much of the farmland in our area has been redeveloped and replaced by large housing estates comprising of mainly private housing. Most of the existing farmland is used for{grazing,}the vast majority by { {cattle. } { Home Farm,}in contrast,consists of 500 acres of which 300 are used for growing{crops}such as wheat,barley,rye and potatoes. The remaining 200 acres of land is used for growing grass used for pasture or for cutting for hay. The farm is run by a{Mr. Charlesworth} and his father. Another local farmer,{Mr. Hughes} keeps cattle which he takes each year to{Banbury Cattle Market}to sell. On the corner of Tuttle Hill and Mancetter Road Nuneaton had its own windmill which was in use until 1937.
